\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{graphicx}

\title{Introduction to LaTeX}
\author{TinyUtils Team}
\date{\today}

\begin{document}

\maketitle

\section{Introduction}

This is a sample \LaTeX{} document demonstrating various features including mathematics, lists, and formatting.

\section{Mathematical Equations}

The quadratic formula is given by:
\begin{equation}
x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}
\end{equation}

Inline math can be written like $E = mc^2$ or $\pi \approx 3.14159$.

\section{Lists}

\subsection{Itemized List}

\begin{itemize}
    \item First item
    \item Second item with \textbf{bold text}
    \item Third item with \textit{italic text}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Enumerated List}

\begin{enumerate}
    \item Introduction
    \item Methodology
    \item Results
    \item Conclusion
\end{enumerate}

\section{Conclusion}

This document demonstrates basic \LaTeX{} syntax for testing the preview renderer.

\end{document}
